name: Parents Not Home
description:
Controls:

W - forward

S -  backward

A - left

d - right

A game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Hi,  I am Alex and this is my project for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.I made this game in 4 days.This is my second game and I hope who ever plays it likes it.This game is about fixing the things that you broke in the house so you dont get grounded.Because I had only 4 days you cant lose and when you interact with something you must keep walking into it.
